snippet.title: Nerd³ Plays... Tiny and Big
snippet.description:
http://nerdcubed.co.uk

Today I play an absolutely gorgeous indie game called "Tiny and Big". It has the best destruction I've seen since Red Faction and more charm then three Hugh Grants tied up with string.

Game site and download! http://www.tinyandbig.com/

My twitter! https://twitter.com/Dannerdcubed

Music during gameplay is taken from the game. It makes me want to slice up mountains.

Additional music by the wonderful Kevin MacLeod
http://www.incompetech.com/

Theme:
"Danse Macabre - Big Hit 1" 
http://www.incompetech.com/m/c/royalty-free/index.html?keywords=%22Danse+Macabre+-+Big+Hit+1%22&Search=Search

Ending and "Heaven" Music 
"Frost Waltz"
http://www.incompetech.com/m/c/royalty-free/index.html?keywords=%22Frost+Waltz%22&Search=Search
